FuncDef: The display dfs-group lacp system-id command displays the LACP M-LAG system ID and priority information. The display dfs-group lacp system-id command displays the LACP M-LAG system ID and priority information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an M-LAG.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 2048.

Specifies the ID of a DFS group.
The value is 1.
